intro.content:
... And welcome aboard if you are new to this newsletter!
In this week's edition we explore the dark side of excellence, we go on a lobster boat and we play hide and seek with an hedgehog. Enjoy!

hero.title: My summer on a lobster boat
hero.description: During her college break, Luna Soley reflects on a time of loneliness, hard work, and natural beauty.
